WorkItem.ClosedComment: These issues should be fixed in the forthcoming 0.9 release.
WorkItem.Description:
Typescript is awesome but tools is just nightmare. So please make it somehow that 
it works out of the box at least for visual studio.

Comments.Message:
It works. But, sometimes it stops to work. 
Mostly it is solved to delete last typed symbols and print them again. 
But, sometimes the above dose not help.
It seems the matter where you are typing code.
I suggest, the team should test this feature more thoroughly.

I created two jpg images to show where it is not working.
intellisence1.jpg shows  where i type  - _template: MOD.temp
there's an error and no intellisence.
But when i fill it completely with  - _template: MOD.template.Template;
it is valid expression.
The intellisence does not work in this case completly, even when i type the clause from the beginning.
intellisence2.jpg shows no error when the clause is completed.
